fullText: Though gorgeously designed and smartly cast, this Romeo and Juliet feels more like a museum piece than a living, breathing tragedy.
dtliExcerpt: Though gorgeously designed and smartly cast, this Romeo and Juliet feels more like a museum piece than a living, breathing tragedy.
